name: Sunlust
description: Pwad file from Doomworld. Requires either the DOOM 2 or the Freedoom phase 2 iwad to play.

files.doom2: N/A:Please select either the DOOM 2 or Freedoom phase 2 iwad file.

content:
files:
- doom2: N/A:Please select either the DOOM 2 or Freedoom phase 2 iwad file.
- sunlust: http://youfailit.net/pub/idgames/levels/doom2/Ports/megawads/sunlust.zip
game:
  files:
  - sunlust.wad
  main_file: doom2
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: sunlust
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: doom2
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/sunlust.wad
